participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and sociable, always looking to connect with others.
participant_1.background: i have one older sister. my favourite artist is travis scott. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. my mother is a dentist. i like playing basketball.

participant_2.name: Eleanor
participant_2.personality: Vibrant and spirited, she has a zest for life that defies her age.
participant_2.background: i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.
